statements: UPDATE wallet_balances SET balance = 1500.50 WHERE user_id = 123 AND account_name = 'Savings' AND cryptocurrency = 'Bitcoin';
UPDATE wallet_balances SET account_name = 'Checking', cryptocurrency = 'Ethereum' WHERE balance = 500.00 AND user_id = 456;
UPDATE wallet_balances SET balance = 1500.25 WHERE user_id = 123 AND account_name = 'Savings' AND cryptocurrency = 'Bitcoin';
UPDATE wallet_balances SET cryptocurrency = 'Ethereum', account_name = 'Investments', balance = 3000.75 WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE wallet_balances SET balance = balance + 100.50 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE crypto_holdings SET amount = amount - 0.75, last_updated = NOW() WHERE currency = 'BTC' AND account_id = 54321;
UPDATE wallet_balances SET balance = 100.50, last_updated = '2022-10-01 08:00:00' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_holdings SET amount = 5.25, last_updated = '2022-10-02 10:30:00', coin_name = 'Bitcoin' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE wallet_balances SET balance = balance + 100.50, last_updated = NOW() WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_holdings SET amount = amount - 0.005, last_updated = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE WalletBalance SET balance = 500 WHERE user_id = '9f523902-31aa-4fd2-8699-53759e60d476';
UPDATE UserAccount SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 'cb6962d4-c57b-4e2b-8176-bd7be9827924';
UPDATE WalletBalance SET balance = balance + 100 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Holding SET amount = amount - 50 WHERE user_id = '5678e912-345a-6789-bcde-fghi12345678' AND currency_id = '9012abcd-3456-7890-ef12-34567890abcd';
UPDATE WalletBalances SET balance = 500 WHERE wallet_id = 12345;
UPDATE Accounts SET username = 'new_username' WHERE account_id = 54321;
UPDATE WalletBalances SET balance = balance - 100 WHERE wallet_id = 12345;
UPDATE Accounts SET username = 'new_username', wallet_id = 54321 WHERE account_id = 100;
